meanings.definition: A male deer, especially a red deer over five years old.
meanings.sent1: The hart gracefully leaped over the fallen log.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful hart in the forest during my hike.
meanings.sent3: The hart decided to challenge the squirrel to a race for fun.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were as alert as a hart in the forest, always watching.
meanings.sent5: The majestic hart stood proudly, its antlers shining in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The hart fearlessly faced the danger to protect his family.
meanings.sent2: He was known as the hart of the village for his courage.
meanings.sent3: The hart bravely rescued the cat from the tree.
meanings.sent4: His heart was as strong as a hart in battle, never faltering.
meanings.sent5: The young boy looked up to his father as a true hart, always there to help.
